doc.field: Located just off I-90 on the Idaho-Montana border, midway between major airports in Spokane , Washington , and Missoula , Montana , the route of the Hiawatha Rail-Trail is a scenic section of abandoned railbed from the Milwaukee Road that the Taft Tunnel Preservation Society, a grassroots Wallace non-profit organization, and the U.S. Forest Service turned into a world class non-motorized trail.
